page.title: 17SANDWICK - MAIL ORDER (1)
page.content: I interveiwed{Mrs Gold}about buying from catalogues. She said she buys from catalogues because it is more conveniant and there is more variety. She found the prices about the same as on the Island and in the catalogue. She has never had any trouble buying from{Kays},she says they are very good. Mostly she buys clothes and toys.{Toys due to Christmas and {clothes for Summer.}She views their fashion choice as reasoable, and the goods also of reasonable quality. I asked her if she thought catalogues varied in quality, she answered , no but some catalogues are more fashion orientated than others. In her opinion catalogues make an enormous profit, but in spite of this she thinks they play a great part in our lifestyle, because they are a way of shopping.
